Linen and cotton are my absolute favorite fabrics but I was really hesitant about ordering any apparel on-line but these linen tops in solid colors were just what i had been searching for!  since most apparel has some kind of print and i just wanted plain, comfy  and in a solid color I thought Id give these a try. . although i bout two I was afraid of getting the wrong size so I ordered a size up and was so glad I did. the size up still was not a  true USA size  (5X was more of a USA 3X) but they fit comfortably and has a slight baggy look that .i love so much so I ordered 3 more colors..tip; wash in cold water, hang to dry (never machine dry) then give a good hot iron pressing.
